attributes.action: Reduce energy cost and housing so people can actually live
attributes.additional_details: Reduce cost of living and get things back to  everyone having a happy life get crime down put criminals away give justice to families
attributes.background: Stop hiking up prices so people don't worry about food and heating going hungry or giving up on life completely put us first  listen to what the uk people are telling you people are going homeless and hungry and the government don't care reduce working tax and help families that work hard to av life

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Energy costs are set by energy providers, and housing costs are set by landlords.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622530
